name: Objection en vertu de l’article 112, paragraphes 2 et 3, du règlement intérieur: substances actives, dont le chlorotoluron et le difénoconazole - Objection pursuant to Rule 112(2) and (3): Active substances, including chlorotoluron and difenoconazole - Einwand gemäß Artikel 112 Absätze 2 und 3 GO: Wirkstoffe, einschließlich Chlortoluron und Difenoconazol -  - Proposition de résolution (ensemble du texte)
title: Objection pursuant to Rule 112(2) and (3) to Implementing Regulation (EU) No 540/2011 as regards the extension of the approval periods of the active substances, including chlorotoluron and difenoconazole
